post.body: ah yes. I see, now that I've plugged back in to the Twitterverse and the blogosphere after the holiday madness.
good evening.
I'm reminded of that Pizza Hut commercial from several years ago.
Damn. I'm only 5'7"
Thanks. It's the second one we lost this year. http://tinyurl.com/665mjg
Photoshop will take care of that. :)
I know!! A bunch of people from middle school found me on Facebook. Parachute pants and mullets galore!
I need the support too. Relocating the family, then going to be separated from them for a while.
I'm happy with Dreamhost. They have one-click installs and one-click upgrades for WordPress and other goodies.
Who won? How did it end?
It was a mighty duel. It ranged all over. Both were masters.
I'm going the other direction.. toward the cold. Coming from Fort Lauderdale.
Hello there! I'll be passing by your neighborhood a week from today. On our way to see family for the holidays.
I don't have Christmas lights, but I've had the same avatar since June.
is right! Duct tape does glow if you stick two pieces together and pull them apart.
Merry Christmas everyone!
Our cat was MIA. Now it's been confirmed that he's KIA. RIP James.
Regular unleaded is $1.67/gal in Davie, FL
I'm walking in the opposite direction of the arrows upstairs at Ikea.
Another bedtime at the wrong side of midnight. Goodnight tweeters.
